snippet: Alta Bicycle Share, the program’s operator in both cities, missed its New York target date last month and will not open in Chicago until next spring.
abstract: Delay of an ambitious bike share program in Chicago run by Alta Bicycle Share raises concerns about a when a similar program in New York City will be up and running; Alta is also in charge of New York's bike share, scheduled to begin in July but now delayed with no new starting date yet announced.
lead_paragraph: Alta Bicycle Share, the program’s operator in both cities, missed its New York target date last month and will not open in Chicago until next spring.

headline.seo: Chicago Delay Fuels Concern About New York’s Bike Sharing
headline.main: Chicago Delay Fuels Concern About New York Bike Sharing
headline.print_headline: Chicago Delay Fuels Concern About New York Bike Sharing
